statement.p: Note the graph shows one second.
What is the frequency of this wave?
What is the period of this wave?
What is the amplitude of this wave?

solution.p: The frequency is 4, because there are 4 copies of the curve from 0 to 1.
The period is 0.25, because one copy of the curve is completed by 0.25. Also period is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{4}}={0.25}.
The amplitude is 2, because the curve oscillates between -2 and 2.
